Body:
dtype_map = {'int8': 'Int8', 'int16': 'Int16', 'int32': 'Int32', 'int64':
    'Int64', 'uint8': 'UInt8', 'uint16': 'UInt16', 'uint32': 'UInt32',
    'uint64': 'UInt64', 'float32': 'Float32', 'float64': 'Float64', 'str':
    'String'}
element = None
if str(array.dtype) in dtype_map.keys():
    element = ET.Element('DataArray')
    element.set('Name', name)
    element.set('NumberOfComponents', str(n))
    element.set('type', dtype_map[str(array.dtype)])
    element.text = '\t'.join(map(str, array.ravel()))
return element
classmethod
